name: Octillery VS. Collection
description:
A collection of updated, refined, and polished versions of the Octillery VS. Trilogy, aswell as a completely new game!

OCTILLERY VS. XI JINPING - Original Version

Sick of giving out horrible tests for the horrible social credit system in China? Sick of the horrible oppressive government? Well it's time you REBEL against them! Fight and protest against Officers and Tanks, and track down Xinnie The Pooh and change China once and for all... Neat party members such as John Xina, The Wock, and Marill The Hedgehog.

OCTILLERY VS. PUTIN - Original Version

China's been saved. And uh- wait what's Putin up to? Russian President Vladimir Putin plans to invade Ukraine! You don't want that, don't you? So what do you do? You go BEAT that boy's ass! Put the PUNT in Putin! Save Ukraine from Russia's wrath! Stop a possible global catastrophe from happening! Returning party members such as John Xina, The Wock, and Marill The Hedgehog.

JONATHAN'S ADVENTURE 2 - Original Version

Jonathan and friends had a break of kicking ass across the world in their first adventure together. The break is broken by a major threat beyond them, but they will practice become stronger and defeat and save the world. T̷h̴i̶s̸ ̵i̴s̸ ̶t̵h̶e̵ ̸e̶x̶c̴l̴u̵s̷i̴v̶e̷ ̵d̸e̸m̸o̶ ̴o̶f̵ ̵t̴h̴e̶ ̶s̷e̷q̶u̷e̶l̴ ̸o̶f̶ ̸J̶o̴n̷a̴t̵h̶a̵n̷'̷s̶ ̵A̴d̸v̶e̵n̵t̴u̵r̶e̸!̴ ̷B̶e̴t̸t̸e̴r̵,̶ ̶g̶r̶e̸a̶t̶e̵r̷ ̵a̵n̶d̸ ̴w̸a̶y̸ ̶m̴o̶r̷e̷ ̴a̴w̶e̵s̶o̴m̸e̴ ̷l̴i̵k̸e̵ ̵y̶o̷u̴'̴v̸e̵ ̷n̶e̸v̵e̸r̶ ̵s̴e̵e̶n̷ ̵i̵t̷ ̶b̶e̸f̷o̵r̶e̸.̸ C̶̦̞̀a̵͕͔̎n̴̙̝̈́̀ ̴̳̒̿͜y̷̮̋̽ő̵͎͍̉ṵ̵̤͊ ̵̪̈́t̶̯̅ã̴̙͝k̵͓̄̐e̴̥̐ ̷̲͋̀ö̴̡͙́͠n̷͎̟̉̒ ̷̻͉͒t̶̡͓̍͑h̷̡͚̉̓ě̷̡͚ ̴͍͍͆̿w̵̫͋̍o̵͈̍r̸̗͕͊ḽ̷͐d̴̢̿͠'̴̛͓̤s̸͈̾ ̶͕̍͠n̷̤͂̃e̶̦͇͛ẅ̷̮́̌ ̵̫̦͊͆c̸̻̔̚ĥ̵͙̼a̴͎̮͗l̴̢̒l̵͚͂̎e̷̼̅ņ̸̙͠g̶̫͕̀͑è̷̜s̶̱̔?̸̞͗ N̶o̶,̵ ̶y̸o̷u̶ ̶c̸a̵n̵n̶o̵t̴!̴ This is all a play by the evil mastermind entertainer, Pricker Jeff! You must put an end to him and his slavery. The president wishes you good luck. New guys join Octillery this time, being Lololo, Yellow, and Needlem0use. "I regret nothing." -Joe Biden eating a hotdog.

﻿OCTILLERY VS. YI LONG MUSK - NEW!

After the, well, mysterious death of Chinese president Xi Jinping, a new one was elected. His name is Yi Long Musk. Him being elected had people thinking China had a new hope, but unfortunately it seems that's not the case. This guy's worse than the last one! ALL party members from previous games return! John Xina, The Wock, Marill The Hedgehog, Lololo, Yellow, and Needlem0use. Assemble your team and retrieve China from the degenerate billionare entrepreneur!

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys or WASD to move.

Enter or Z for actions such as interacting or selecting.

Esc or X to cancel.

F or G to fast forward.

....

And extras....?
